title: Adsorption of oral antibacterial agents on zirconia surfaces with different crystal systems
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26457-26463
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04084H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mihiro Itotagawa, Hiroshi Kono, Tadahiro Higashinakao, Yuki Sugiura, Yuta Otsuka, Masafumi Kikuchi, Yoshihiro Nishitani
Zirconia ceramics are widely used as dental prosthetics. In this study, we evaluated the adsorption ability of quaternary amines used as antibacterial substances in toothpaste onto zirconia surfaces with tetragonal and monoclinic crystal structures.
